      Methods in Data_Access with parameters of type GoalLogic 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GoalDBConnect.deleteGoal(GoalLogic object)
      Deletes a Goal row from the database that corresponds the the GoalLogic passed to this method.
      void GoalDBConnect.insertGoal(GoalLogic object)
      Inserts information from passed GoalLogic into the database Empty Goal Logic objects will throw a NullPointer if it has not been initialized and a SQL error if it has not been populated correctly
      void GoalDBConnect.updateGoal(GoalLogic object)
      Updates Row in the database that corresponds the GoalLogic object passed to the method
